cause.description:
This cause is to fundraise and put toghether money so that we can all get really drunk on my birthday and have a fun time. My birthday isnt until August 11th but we should start fundraising as so as possible. The idea was that if 10-30 people pitch in 20$ we can either get a texas mickey every 5 people, or every 15 people that pitch in 20$ we can get a keg.
1. We MUST Get Drunk !
2. We Have The Right 2 Get Drunk !
3. We Will Get Drunk !
cause.mission: Get Us Drunk On My B-Day
cause.name: Getting Us Drunk On My B-Day
